title: Binance Founder CZ Released from Prison – Announces New DeFi Project
shortdescription: Changpeng Zhao walks free after 4-month sentence – crypto community celebrates.
description: CZ hints at launching privacy-focused DeFi exchange with zero-KYC trading – BNB pumps 25% on announcement.
author: Emma Chen

title: Roaring Kitty Returns: GameStop Stock Up 400% in One Week
shortdescription: Keith Gill posts first tweet in 3 years — meme stock mania returns bigger than 2021.
description: GME squeezes short sellers for $8B in losses as retail traders pile in — déjà vu of 2021 but with 10x volume.
author: Mark Blaze

title: Circle Files for $50 Billion IPO – USDC Becomes First Public Stablecoin Giant
shortdescription: USDC issuer goes public at highest crypto valuation since Coinbase – Tether market share plummets.
description: Circle's S-1 reveals $1.1B annual revenue, 85% institutional volume, and plans to dominate regulated stablecoin market after going public in 2025.
author: Emma Chen
